meanings.definition: The quality or state of being indissoluble.
meanings.sent1: The indissolublenesses of their friendship was evident in their unwavering loyalty to each other.
meanings.sent2: The scientist marveled at the indissolublenesses of the chemical bond holding the atoms together.
meanings.sent3: The indissolublenesses of the puzzle pieces made it impossible for the toddler to separate them.
meanings.sent4: The indissolublenesses of tradition and culture intertwined seamlessly in the small village.
meanings.sent5: The indissolublenesses of love and trust formed the foundation of their relationship.

meanings.definition: The inability to be dissolved or separated.
meanings.sent1: The indissolublenesses of the glue made it impossible to separate the two pieces of paper.
meanings.sent2: The indissolublenesses of the rock formations in the cave fascinated the geologists.
meanings.sent3: The indissolublenesses of the twins' bond was so strong that they always finished each other's sentences.
meanings.sent4: The indissolublenesses of the team members ensured they worked together harmoniously towards their goal.
meanings.sent5: The indissolublenesses of the contract bound them to their agreement, with no room for changes.
